resources.string:
Welcome,

This application is now running on background acting as peer to other devices, providing routing or network services, depending on the ability of connecting to the Internet.

You can minimize this application to keep providing these services to peers or go to the client area where you can request these services from nearby devices.

Disclaimer: this application changes your WiFi Direct advertising name to your Bluetooth MAC address. Security issues may come from this action. Be aware.

How To:

To use the client you need to enter a valid address of a website like so: www.google.com. The necessary headers will be automatically added to your URL.
In case of a bad address input, an error page will be displayed.
A list of peers will appear shortly.
